projects.name: E-commerce Website
projects.description: Designed and established a comprehensive E-commerce website using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js) to provide a seamless shopping experience. Implemented features such as product listings, shopping cart, and order processing, ensuring robust backend logic and an intuitive frontend interface.

projects.name: Instagram Reach Analysis
projects.description: Developed an Instagram reach analysis project involving data preprocessing, visualization, and application of machine learning techniques. Evaluated multiple regression methods to determine the most effective for maximizing audience engagement on Instagram, ultimately enhancing content strategy and driving a significant increase in user interactions.

projects.name: Fast Food Billing System
projects.description: Designed and developed a Fast Food Billing System using a combination of HTML, CSS, JavaScript for frontend development, and Python for backend logic. Utilized MySQL for database management to ensure efficient data handling. Created user-friendly interfaces for order management, item modification, and bill generation to enhance customer service efficiency.

experiences.company_name: Andhra Pradesh State Skill Development Corporation (APSSDC)
experiences.description: Built web applications using Django, applying HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap for front-end development. Gained experience with Python fundamentals, database management using MySQL.

Utilized ResNet-50 and applied various data augmentation techniques for early detection of glaucoma. Analyzed ocular imaging data with Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs), comparing different augmentation strategies to improve diagnostic accuracy and contribute to preventive glaucoma detection.

Explored the integration of machine learning techniques into financial markets, focusing on algorithmic trading, alpha generation, and applications. Conducted research on the challenges and limitations of machine learning applications in finance.
